```{r}
library(psych)      # scree plot, communalities
library(stats)      # factanal()

dat  <- read.table("Data/testData.txt", header = FALSE)
colnames(dat) <- paste0("T", 1:6)        # six test scores
R <- cor(dat)

## ----- (a)  number of factors & unrotated solution -----
psych::fa.parallel(dat, fa = "fa")       # scree & parallel analysis

m <- 2                                   # (example) eigenvalues > 1 and elbow
fa_raw <- factanal(dat, factors = m, rotation = "none", scores = "regression")

print(fa_raw, digits = 3, cutoff = 0.3)  # loadings â‰¥.30 only
communalities <- 1 - fa_raw$uniquenesses
specificities <- fa_raw$uniquenesses
```
